Scenes.VoiceOverText: Do you know that there is a mysterious book from ancient India, whose author is in non-human entity?
Scenes.Text: Do you know that there is a mysterious book from ancient India, whose author is in non-human entity?

Scenes.VoiceOverText: The book is famously known as the Song of the Free Soul or the Avatar to Geeta.
Scenes.Text: The book is famously known as the Song of the Free Soul or the Avatar to Geeta.

Scenes.VoiceOverText: It has single-handedly influenced multiple ancient traditions, including the Nath tradition.
Scenes.Text: It has single-handedly influenced multiple ancient traditions, including the Nath tradition.

Scenes.VoiceOverText: The followers of the Nath tradition consider Lord Shiva as their first teacher or adiguru.
Scenes.Text: The followers of the Nath tradition consider Lord Shiva as their first teacher or adiguru.
